hero.title: Protect Your Crops with Advanced AI
hero.description: From detection to prevention, our smart platform uses cutting-edge computer vision to identify plant diseases instantly and provide sustainable solutions for farmers worldwide.
hero.joinedBy: Joined by <1>{{count}}k+ farmers</1> saving millions in crop losses.

features.title: Powerful Features for Smarter Farming
features.description: We combine advanced satellite imagery, AI vision, and agronomy data to give you the most accurate agricultural insights available.

interface.title: User-Friendly Interface
interface.description: A clean and intuitive home page designed for seamless navigation and easy access to all tools.

detection.title: Disease Detection
detection.description: Upload leaf images and let our AI automatically identify diseases with high precision.

results.title: Results & Accuracy
results.description: View detailed analysis results including the detected disease and confidence score of the prediction.

medicine.title: Medicine Recommendations
medicine.description: Receive tailored treatment suggestions and appropriate medicine recommendations for cures.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Use the platform in your preferred language to ensure accessibility for everyone.

weather.title: Weather Alerts
weather.description: Get timely alerts based on weather conditions that could impact your plant's health.

cta.title: Ready to transform your farm with AI precision?
cta.description: Join the thousands of smart farmers already optimizing their crop health with PlantCare AI.

footer.mission: Empowering the next generation of farmers with artificial intelligence to ensure global food security and sustainable agricultural practices.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Please enter your details to sign in.
login.overlayText: To keep connected with us please login with your personal info.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Join us to start detecting plant diseases.
signup.overlayText: Enter your personal details and start your journey with us.

dashboard.overviewSubtitle: Here's what's happening with your garden today.

actions.detectDesc: Upload a photo of your plant's leaf to identify diseases and get treatment recommendations within seconds.

settings.title: Language Settings
settings.subtitle: Choose your preferred language for the application
settings.note: Note: Language changes will apply to all interface elements and notifications.

help.title: Guide & Help
help.quickStartDesc: Learn how to use PlantCare effectively
help.supportDesc: Our support team is here to assist you
guides: How to scan a plant for diseases

faqItems.a: Our AI model has a 94%+ accuracy rate on most common plant diseases.
We support most vegetable crops including tomatoes, potatoes, peppers, and more.

tips.title: Quick Tips
items: Capture the leaf under bright, indirect natural light for best results.
Ensure the focus is sharp on the affected area of the plant.
Regular weekly scans help detect diseases in early stages.

accuracy.title: AI Accuracy
accuracy.desc: Our models are currently performing with 94.2% accuracy on vegetable crops.
